p: The results observed in the rats given nitrite plus walnut oil suggested that the administration of walnut oil at the dosages and times of treatment used in our study decreased the interference nitrite would otherwise have had in the development and maturation of the male gonad, as illustrated by the fact that all females mated with them got pregnant. The improvement of fertility in the group treated with nitrite plus walnut oil showed that walnut oil acts as a powerful antioxidant to protect the oxidative stress of nitrite on the testes. Walnut has been reported to contain zinc and vitamin E, and the latter has been described as an excellent lipid soluble chain-breaking antioxidant ( Traber & Atkinson, 2007).
